name: Wooden Hearts
description:
Story:

Hundreds of children went missing in the last couple of years.

Nobody knows what happened to them but you have one last clue that led you to an old abandoned House. With only one lamp and your hope you go to investigate. What will you find in the darkness?

Info:

I made this game all by myself within a week. I used Asset Forge to create my own stuff and also used some assets from Kenney - Graveyard Kit.

There are stilll many bugs left but I wanted to finish it in time for the SCREAM JAM 2019.

Have fun playing and let me know what you think! 

(Bug reports are also welcome)

!! Please let me know if you don't know how to finish the game!!
